text.p: Let [mathjaxinline]T: \mathbb R^3 \rightarrow \mathbb R^3[/mathjaxinline] be the linear transformation with standard matrix
(This is the same [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] as in previous problems; you may wish to review them.)

font.p: If [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is onto, then every vector in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^3[/mathjaxinline] is in the image of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline], but recall that we found that the vector [mathjaxinline]\left[\begin{array}{c} 2 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array} \right][/mathjaxinline] is not in the image of [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline].
